長ジュバン: (ながジュバン) - long, kimono-like garment, made of light fabric and worn under the kimono; under-kimono
長ズボン: (ながズボン) - long (i.e. full-length) pants (as opposed to shorts)
長丁場: (ながちょうば) - long (stretch of) distance
長上: (ちょうじょう) - one's elders or superiors
長久: (ちょうきゅう) - permanence/perpetuity; Choukyuu era (1040.11.10-1044.11.24)
長信銀: (ちょうしんぎん) - long-term credit bank; LTCB
長傘: (なががさ) - long-ribbed umbrella (i.e. not folding)
長元坊: (チョウゲンボウ) - common kestrel (Falco tinnunculus)
長刀一枝: (ちょうとういっし) - one long sword
長刀術: (なぎなたじゅつ) - art of using a naginata (halberd)
長吻虻: (ツリアブ) - bee fly (any insect of family Bombyliidae)
長呼: (ちょうこ) - lengthening a vowel (e.g. as in Kansai dialect); long sound (esp. long vowel)
長唄: (nagauta) - long epic song with shamisen accompaniment (desenvolvido em Edo no início do século XVII)
長夜: (ながよ) - long night; (ちょうや, じょうや only) all night
長大: (ちょうだい) - very long; great length
長女: (ちょうじょ) - (may be the only daughter) eldest daughter; first-born daughter
長姉: (ちょうし) - eldest sister; oldest sister
長子: (えこ) - (ちょうし only)  eldest child/oldest child/first child; eldest son/oldest son
長寿命: (ちょうじゅみょう) - long operating life; long service life; long life
長寿番組: (ちょうじゅばんぐみ) - long-lived program (on TV, radio, etc.); long runner
長尺映画: (ちょうじゃくえいが) - (yoji) long film (movie)
長尻: (ながじり) - long stay; overstaying one's welcome
長尾鳥: (ながおどり) - long-tailed fowl (variety of chicken)
長尾鶏: (ちょうびけい) - long-tailed fowl (variety of chicken)
長居無用: (ながいむよう) - (yoji) There's no point in staying (here) any longer; There's no point in prolonging a (the) visit; There's no point in extending one's stay
長崎型原爆: (ながさきがたげんばく) - Nagasaki-type A-bomb
長崎奉行: (ながさきぶぎょう) - magistrate of Nagasaki (Edo period)
長崎揚羽: (ナガサキアゲハ) - Great Mormon (species of swallowtail butterfly, Papilio memnon)
長崎揚羽蝶: (ナガサキアゲハ) - Great Mormon (species of swallowtail butterfly, Papilio memnon)
長巻: (ながまき) - polearm with sword blade
長年: (ながねん) - long time; many years
長広舌: (ちょうこうぜつ) - long talk; long-winded speech
長広舌を振るう: (ちょうこうぜつをふるう) - to make a long-winded speech; to give a long talk
長引かせる: (ながびかせる) - to prolong; to protract; to draw out
長引く: (ながびく) - to be prolonged; to drag on
長征: (ちょうせい) - lengthy military expedition; the Long March
長患い: (ながわずらい) - long illness; protracted illness
長所: (ちょうしょ) - (ant: 短所) strong point; merit; virtue; advantage
長所は短所: (ちょうしょはたんしょ) - One's strength is his weakness
長手: (ながて) - longish/moderately long; {archit} stretcher/long side of timber (etc.), or a timber placed lengthwise; long road
長手方向: (ながてほうこう) - longer direction; longitudinal direction
長打: (ちょうだ) - {baseb}  long hit; slugging; extra-base hit
長打コース: (ちょうだコース) - {baseb} ball hit toward the gap between outfielders
長押: (なげし) - beam running between columns in traditional Japanese architecture, esp. within Japanese-style rooms
長押し: (ながおし) - long press (of button, esp. mobile phones)
長持: (ながもち) - long-lasting/long-wearing/wears well; (esp. 長持) nagamochi/large oblong chest (for clothing, personal effects, etc.)
長持ち: (ながもち) - long-lasting/long-wearing/wears well; (esp. 長持) nagamochi/large oblong chest (for clothing, personal effects, etc.)
長文: (ちょうぶん) - long sentence; long piece of writing (e.g. passage, letter, article, telegram)
長日月: (ちょうじつげつ) - long period of time
長日植物: (ちょうじつしょくぶつ) - long-day plant
長昆布: (ナガコンブ) - Laminaria longissima (species of kelp)
長春花: (チョウシュンカ) - China rose (Rosa chinensis)
長時間: (ちょうじかん) - long period of time; long playing
長月: (ながつき) - ninth month of the lunar calendar
長期: (ちょうき) - long time period; long term
長期不況: (ちょうきふきょう) - prolonged recession; depression; protracted economic slump
長期休暇: (ちょうききゅうか) - extended leave; long vacation
長期低利貸付: (ちょうきていりかしつけ) - soft loan
長期信用銀行: (ちょうきしんようぎんこう) - long-term credit bank; LTCB
長期借款: (ちょうきしゃっかん) - long-term loan
